entries.caption: Histograms compairing untrimmed (A) and trimmed (B) datasets.
Violin/Sina plot of untrimmed (A) and trimmed (B) days in solitary. The respective untrimmed and trimmed meands are shown as dashed blue lines. Outliers showin in red.
QQ-Plot of untrimmed (A) and trimmed (B) days in solitary with a 95% confidence interval shown in gray.
Untrimmed and Trimmed Summary Statistics of Days in Solitary
